Body:
nodal_set = ['a', 'b', 'c']
pool_set = ['x', 'y', 'z']
activation_set = ['m', 'n', 'p']
op_sets = [(nodal, pool, activation) for nodal in nodal_set for pool in
    pool_set for activation in activation_set]
op_set_recovered = gop_operators.get_op_set(nodal_set, pool_set, activation_set
    )
assert tuple(op_sets) == op_set_recovered
